title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: Harper Lee's 1960 novel To Kill a Mockingbird won a Pulitzer Prize, inspired a popular movie, and has been read appreciatively by millions of readers. Its impact is prodigious: A survey by the Book of the Month Club and the Library of Congress Center for the Book found that this gripping fiction about racial justice was ranked behind only the Bible as the book most often cited as making a difference. This attractive hardcover collectors edition honors this modern world classic.
author: Harper Lee
